com.algebraweb.editor.client.services
Interface RemoteManipulationService

All Superinterfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService
All Known Implementing Classes:
PlanCommunicationServlet
@RemoteServiceRelativePath(value="manipulate")
public interface RemoteManipulationService
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService

The Remote Manipulation Service. The main class for editing communications. Provides methods for changed to plan model on the server.

Author:
Patrick Brosi

Method Detail

addEdge

RemoteManipulationMessage addEdge(int planid,
                                  Tuple fromTo,
                                  int pos)
                                  throws PlanManipulationException,
                                         PlanHasCycleException
Adds an edge to the plan model.

Parameters:
planid - The plan to use
fromTo - the tuple (from,to)
pos - the child position
Returns:
a RemoteManipulationMessage
Throws:
PlanManipulationException
PlanHasCycleException

Parameters:

nodeType - the type of the node to add

y - the y position of the new node

a RemoteManipulationMessage

Parameters:

Returns:
the id of the added plan

deleteEdges

RemoteManipulationMessage deleteEdges(java.util.Map<Tuple,java.lang.Integer> map,
                                      int planid)
                                      throws PlanManipulationException,
                                             PlanHasCycleException
Delete edges.

Parameters:
map - a map of all edges that should be deleted. Key is tuple (from,to), value is the child position.
planid - the plan to use
Returns:
A RemoteManipulationMessage
Throws:
PlanManipulationException
PlanHasCycleException

                                         int pid,

                                         throws PlanManipulationException,
